attributes.action: provide the option to pay Vehicle Road Tax by regular monthly direct debit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The cost of car tax has risen for many and more commonly are we seeing companies offering payment by regular monthly direct debit payments. 

Currently the DVLA do not offer this service and we feel this should now be an option made available to the public to pay for their road vehicle road tax.
